metadata.title: CVE-2021-37600 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An integer overflow in util-linux through 2.37.1 can potentially cause a buffer overflow if an attacker were able to use system resources in a way that leads to a large number in the /proc/sysvipc/sem file. NOTE: this is unexploitable in GNU C Library environments, and possibly in all realistic environments.

criterions.comment: util-linux package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
